snippet: Ms. DiDonato, sharing the stage with the Philadelphia Orchestra, wrapped up her Perspectives series in New York with arias and scenes from bel canto operas.
lead_paragraph: Ms. DiDonato, sharing the stage with the Philadelphia Orchestra, wrapped up her Perspectives series in New York with arias and scenes from bel canto operas.

headline.main: Review: Joyce DiDonato Blends Bel Canto and Emotion at Carnegie Hall
